text: Bad Girl is a 1931 American drama movie directed by Frank Borzage and was based on the 1928 novel and 1930 play of the same name by Vi√±a Delmar. It stars Sally Eilers, James Dunn, Minna Gombell and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for 3 Oscars and won 2 Academy Awards in 1932. ==Cast== *Sally Eilers as Dorothy Haley *James Dunn as Eddie Collins *Minna Gombell as Edna Driggs ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1931 drama movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Frank Borzage Category:English-language movies Category:Black-and- white movies
title: Bad Girl
